jd_information.description: Looking for the candidate who has experience in MICE Domestic inbound for one of the leading Travel company.Bachelor/Master’s degree in tourism or a related discipline from a reputed University/Institute6-10 years of work experience in Domestic & Inbound MICE operation functionsShould have handled/executed a good number of MICE events originating from Corporate, Associations, Govt. & Semi Govt. Bodies at Multi-locationsShould have effective knowledge of MICE Business sources/pockets.Strong Knowledge of HTML, Word , Microsoft excel and PowerPoint. RegardsMayuri01146070366
